title: Mastery 6 token not showing up in Hextech crafting
body:
Hello, I recently played an adc Twitch game. In this game I got an S+ at the end, and hit mastery 5. After the window telling me I got a hextech chest, it also told me that I got a mastery 6 token. I went to my hextech crafting window to look at it, and it was not there. I thought that it was just loading in, or something and I'd check again the next day. I checked again today and it still wasn't there. I browsed the support forums a bit to see if anyone else had the same problem and I couldn't find any solution. Plz Riot... I wantz my mastery 6 tokenz
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Thank you, both of you for your help. :) I thought the mastery 6 token GUI window came up on my screen but I guess it was not. Thank you again!!

*Zombiemaster* is spot on with their analysis of the situation. In all the excitement of reaching mastery level 5, it's certainly possible to misunderstand the token message that pops up. 

I recommend taking a peek at our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) as well. Let me know if you have any questions.

Mastery 6 tokens are not awarded if you get an S- or better the same game you reach mastery level 5. Tokens are only awarded for games _after_ you reach mastery level 5. The notification that showed up was saying that you are now eligible to earn mastery 6 tokens, not hat you have actually
